statements: SELECT * FROM iris_scan_images;
SELECT image_name, scan_date FROM iris_scan_images;
SELECT id, image_name FROM iris_scan_images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_images WHERE scan_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_name, id FROM iris_scan_images ORDER BY image_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_name, scan_date FROM iris_scan_images WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(id) AS average_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM iris_scan_images GROUP BY image_name;
SELECT image_name, COUNT(*) AS total_images FROM iris_scan_images GROUP BY image_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_images WHERE scan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_images;
SELECT id, image_data FROM iris_scan_images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_data FROM iris_scan_images ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, image_data FROM iris_scan_images WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, image_data FROM iris_scan_images WHERE id > 2 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, image_data FROM iris_scan_images WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT i.id, i.image_data, s.person_id, s.scan_time FROM iris_scan_images i JOIN identification s ON i.id = s.image_id WHERE s.person_id = 123 ORDER BY s.scan_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM iris_scan_images;
SELECT AVG(id) AS average_id, AVG(length(image_data)) AS average_image_length FROM iris_scan_images;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans;
SELECT id, image_data FROM iris_scans;
SELECT username, iris_scan_id FROM users WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, user_id FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, iris_scan_id FROM users JOIN iris_scans ON iris_scans.id = users.iris_scan_id;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, user_id FROM users WHERE iris_scan_id = 2 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 3 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users INNER JOIN iris_scans ON users.iris_scan_id = iris_scans.id WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_logs, user_id FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY num_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans;
SELECT id, image_path FROM iris_scans ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT username, full_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY scan_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans ORDER BY scan_date DESC, image_path ASC;
SELECT image_path, user_id, scan_date FROM iris_scans WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT users.username, iris_scans.scan_date FROM users INNER JOIN iris_scans ON users.user_id = iris_scans.user_id WHERE users.full_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT users.full_name, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_scans, users.full_name FROM iris_scans JOIN users ON iris_scans.user_id = users.user_id GROUP BY users.full_name ORDER BY total_scans DESC;
SELECT * FROM iris_images
SELECT iris_id, image FROM iris_images WHERE iris_id = 1
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM departments WHERE department_name LIKE '%IT%'
SELECT log_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY access_time ASC
SELECT * FROM users JOIN iris_images ON users.iris_id = iris_images.iris_id
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 10 ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT users.user_id, departments.department_name FROM users JOIN departments ON users.user_id = departments.department_id
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR username LIKE 'B%'
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE access_time >= '2022-01-01'
